title: Explain Closing Costs to a First-Time Buyer
description: A first-time home buyer is confused by the list of closing costs on their loan estimate. Their agent must explain the different fees.

tasks.description: Review the buyer's Loan Estimate document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is familiar with the specific figures and fees listed.

tasks.description: Explain each major closing cost, such as lender fees, title insurance, appraisal fee, and pre-paid items (taxes, insurance).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, line-by-line explanation of the costs.

tasks.description: Advise the buyer to compare the Loan Estimate with the final Closing Disclosure to ensure there are no major changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The buyer understands how to review their final closing documents.
